means: 盲文，（盲人用）布莱叶点字法
(B-)布莱叶(Louis, 1809-1852，法国盲人教育家，盲文点写法的设计者)

word_mean: 〔Louis Braille，法国盲文教师，1809～1852〕盲人点字法：使用供触知的点符书写或印刷的文字系统，供盲人使用

sentence.Network_en: Books are now printed in braille.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多书现在都用盲文印.

sentence.Network_en: My fingers scan a book in braille.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的手指扫描着一本盲文书.

sentence.Network_en: Braille used raised dots, just as in night writing.
sentence.Network_cn: 在代码中,布莱叶使用突起的小点, 就像“夜间文字”中所用的小点一样.

entry.def: Braille is a system of printing for blind people. The letters are printed as groups of raised dots that you can feel with your fingers.

auth_sentence.content: Few documents came over the transom in braille.
